blog.name: zajelimilogin
blog.title: Dream a little bigger, darling.
blog.description:
Woman.
Determined.
Braided.

What else?
Normality is overrated.
Wibbly wobbly, timey wimey.
Black, two sugars. I'll be upstairs.
One more miracle, please.

You mustn't be afraid to dream a little bigger, darling.

summary: Good Run - Bucky Barnes x Reader
title: Good Run - Bucky Barnes x Reader
body:
Prompt:  Imagine Bucky and Steve being super protective of you during fights even though you’re also an Avenger

You were the Avenger’s secret weapon. 

In your spin-off Iron Man armor, you appeared to be just a person in a suit, like Tony and Rhodey. You were just a fighter in a suit to the enemy. No one suspected someone with telekinesis to be hiding behind the mask. You gave the team info straight from the mind of the enemy. No one suspected a thing and you were usually in an out without a scratch. 

Today was different. 

While you flew in behind Wanda and Vision, you realized you were needed for more than your mental abilities - the team truly needed backup. You flew down to your two immediate concerns - Steve and Bucky. You had known them since childhood. While Steve froze in the ice, you and Bucky were trained for Hydra. They were the ones to give you your telekinesis. 

“What’s happening?” you ask, you and your AI both on alert. 
“We can’t see them. There are energy senses but they’re far and diluted. It’s like they’ve cloaked themselves,” Tony said in your ear. 
“I can hear them. And they’re not far. They are right on top of us,” you say, your voice barely a whisper. “Haven’t worked out if they’re alien or just using alien tech.” 

With the words barely past your lips, beings form out of nowhere. “Spoke too soon. Definitely alien,” you say, before raising your blasters and firing. 

With Steve and Bucky behind you, you began taking on the aliens. Kill him raced through your head, the words directed at Bucky. You fell to his level and your armor formed a shield in front of you. “What are you doing?” Bucky’s voice rasped. “You’re going to get yourself killed!”
“No,” you say, pausing as the legion begins to shoot at your shield. “You are.” 

You continue on, protecting your boys from imminent death. Slowly, the lines lessened. You had won. You drop to the ground, allowing your helmet to disappear. “Good job as always, (Y/N),” Bucky says from behind you. As you turn, a blast hits your chest and you crumple. 

Tony quickly blasts the alien and the three men run to your side. “How’s she looking F.R.I.D.A.Y?” You don’t hear the response, but aren’t too hopeful as Tony begins piping grey material into your gaping chest. 
“You’re going to be okay, (Y/N),” Steve says, cradling your head. 
“Walk it off,” you echo his old words. He smiles, tears blurring his eyes. 
“Come on, doll, there is no way you’re dying on my watch,” Bucky says, hands grasping yours. 

Tony retreats, presumably calling orders. You’re left with your two oldest friends. “It’s been a good run, boys,” you say. 
She’s dying, Steve’s thoughts echo.
You sniffle, holding onto Steve and Bucky tightly. 
Help is miles away, Tony’s voice adds. 
“You’re going to be fine,” Steve says, sobs raking his body. 
I love you, Bucky’s voice says, his mind barely a whisper. Your hand reaches up to stroke his face. “I love you more.”

Bucky’s body collapses onto yours, pulling your chest to his. His body is shaking, and tears now stream down your face as well. Bucky picks you up, his quavering arms shaking your weak body. You allow your suit to collapse into your necklace, lightening his load. 
“Fly her to the nearest hospital,” Bucky demands. 
Tony shakes his head. “She’ll never make it.”

You stare up at the three men, their figures becoming blurry. You try to etch into their minds, but you can’t pass through. Your eyes flicker shut, the world turning dark.

title: I will always be here
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2yU5fsx

by SugarCloud15

Peter Parker was a normal kid, except for two things:

1)He was Tony Stark’s son. (but he kept his mother’s name after she had died)
2)He had cancer.

Peter is sick. Tony is overprotective. Ned is a sweetheart. MJ is quietly supportive.
The Avengers are just watching and supporting from the sidelines.

tags: peter sees tony as a dad
Let me know what you think
summary: 5 Times Peter Called Tony Dad
title: 5 Times Peter Called Tony Dad
body:
1) Decathlon

Peter had been spending all his spare time when he wasn’t on patrol or at school studying for the decathlon regionals. If Midtown won this they were going to the Championship. The meet was this coming weekend so he wanted to make sure he was prepared. Peter even started studying at lunch much to the pleasure of MJ. He hadn’t missed a single practice much to the annoyance of Flash.   After practice Peter began to walk home before stopping and seeing a bright orange Audi parked just outside the school grounds.

Tony rolled down the window and smiled at peter “Hey kiddo hop in”

“Hey Mr. Stark I didn’t think today was a lab day?” peter asked as he got into the passenger seat.

“It wasn’t originally but I called May she told me about your Decathlon Meet next weekend that you’ve been studying like crazy, she thought you needed a break” tony said pulling off his sunglasses

“Oh well I just want to make sure were prepared if we win this we go to the championship” peter said

“Pete you’re the smartest kid I know but don’t tire yourself out” tony said as he pulled away from the curb “you need to relax a bit”

Peter smiled at tony at the compliment “I just don’t want to let the team down” peter said honestly

“Pete you could never anyone down but how about this once we get to the compound ill help you study for a bit but then we have a movie night to relax, sound good?” tony asked with a smile

“Sounds great thanks tony” peter said smiling

“No problem kiddo” tony said as returned his attention to the road.

When the got to the compound they went to the Common room and tony used peter’s notes to quiz peter for about half an hour then told him to take his backpack to his room and decide on a movie by the time he got back. Tony went to the kitchen to make popcorn and grab drinks.

Peter walked back into the common room. “Friday play Moana”

“Right away Peter” the AI replied.  The screen lit up and peter curled into the couch.

Tony walked into the room and smiled “of course Disney you’re so predictable kid” tony said as he placed the popcorn on the table and sat next to him.

About half way through the movie tony glanced over at peter. He looked like he was close to nodding off on Tony’s chest. Tony ran his hand through peter’s curls lazily trying to lull peter to sleep.

“Thanks for today, Dad” peter said sleepily into his chest making tony freeze in his place.

Did he hear the kid right does he think of him as a father figure?

He didn’t want to wake him so all he responded “No problem Pete” before beginning to nod off as well.

The Decathlon Regionals finally arrived. Peter was a bundle of nerves while he was on stage with the rest of his team. He looked out into the crowd and smiled at his Aunt who managed to get off for the meet. She waved at him but them she saw his aunt turn to greet someone. His eyes bulged when he saw Tony Stark walk over and sit next to May. Tony was in his standard suit and sunglasses. . He took off his shades and waved at peter. Peter smiled and waved back. Peter couldn’t believe Mr. Stark came to his decathlon meet he probably had so many more things he should be doing but he was there, ready to cheer him on, like a dad would. Peter knew nothing would stop him now. As all his nerves left his body and the first question was asked.

Tony walked into the room and smiled “of course Disney you’re so predictable kid” tony said as he placed the popcorn on the table and sat next to him.

About half way through the movie tony glanced over at peter. He looked like he was close to nodding off on Tony’s chest. Tony ran his hand through peter’s curls lazily trying to lull peter to sleep.

“Thanks for today, Dad” peter said sleepily into his chest making tony freeze in his place.

Did he hear the kid right does he think of him as a father figure?

He didn’t want to wake him so all he responded “No problem Pete” before beginning to nod off as well.

The Decathlon Regionals finally arrived. Peter was a bundle of nerves while he was on stage with the rest of his team. He looked out into the crowd and smiled at his Aunt who managed to get off for the meet. She waved at him but them she saw his aunt turn to greet someone. His eyes bulged when he saw Tony Stark walk over and sit next to May. Tony was in his standard suit and sunglasses. . He took off his shades and waved at peter. Peter smiled and waved back. Peter couldn’t believe Mr. Stark came to his decathlon meet he probably had so many more things he should be doing but he was there, ready to cheer him on, like a dad would. Peter knew nothing would stop him now. As all his nerves left his body and the first question was asked.

summary: One shot: Promise
title: One shot: Promise
body:
Requested by @blackreaders-assemble: Hello, darling! May I get a Tony Stark x black reader based on the song Promise by Ciara? Please & thank you! ❤️

Pairing: Black plus sized reader x Tony Stark

Warning(s): angst, cussing

Word count:  1354


Come enjoy the life
Baby, take a ride
I just wanna vibe with you, you
Baby, you and I can have a good time
Tell me what you like
Oo, oo

 

Now, listen
I’ve been single for a while now
And I’ve been kind of lonely
But I’m looking for somebody to talk to
Love me, someone who can hold me
Is that you?

 

I’m looking for somebody I can call boo
Looking for the only one that I can give my all to
Tell me if it’s you, you, you
What you wanna do, do, do?
Make your move
You can be my teacher
I’ll do homework
You can give me extra credit, baby
I’ll do more work
What you wanna do, do, do?
Now it’s me and you, you, you
The mood

 

“I’m fucking done” you hissed while thick tears streamed down your face while throwing another suitcase in front of the door before storming your way back up the stairs while huffing and cussing to yourself, the unbearable pain in your chest making it hard for you to stay calm and collective.

When you reached the bedroom, you took the last suitcase from under the king-sized bed and began to fill it with your final clothes, your heart breaking more while seeing how empty his bedroom looked like without your belongings. It only made you huff out in anger “Only shows how devoted I was to our marriage” you whispered before zipping the suitcase up and storming your way out of the bedroom again.

“Mr. Stark is pulling into the driveway” F.R.I.D.A.Y informed you, making your heart drop to the pit of your stomach upon realizing that packing your belongings (while screaming and crying) had taken you longer than expected. “Don’t call me that” you hissed and rushed your way to the front door, hoping that you’d be able to get to your car with your suitcase and leave your husband for good.

“Baby” Tony said while storming into the mansion, so much regret and shame clouding his eyes when he almost tripped over your suitcases before looking at you. His heart dropped to the pit of his stomach, realizing that he had messed up really bad. You huffed and took a step back while wiping your tears away.

 

‘Cause, baby
There’s nothing I won’t do
To spend my life with you
I’ll give my all to you


I promise that I will never lie to you, boy
There’s nothing I won’t do
To spend my life with you
I’ll give my all to you
I promise that I will never lie to you, boy

You and me together
Picture perfect


I’ll spend all my money all my time
Because you’re worth it
It’s just me and you, you, you
What you wanna do, do, do?
Make a move
Call me mama, spoil you like a baby
Thinking about you, dreaming about you
Got me going crazy
What you wanna do, do, do?
Now it’s me and you, you, you
The mood, yeah

 

 

“Don’t call me that” you hissed, your body trembling from the immense pain and anger. Your husband bit his lip, trying to hold in the tears as he took a step forwards and reached his hands out to you, “Please let me explain” he begged, feeling nauseous that he had brought you to this point.

“Explain what?!” you burst out, the salty tears making their way down your cheeks again. “How you forgot our wedding anniversary three times in a row?!” you yelled, not caring how your loud voice echoed through the mansion.

Tony bowed his head in shame and clenched his fits “How you keep neglecting me?! Your fucking wife?!” you continued, in desperate need to tell him how you had been feeling the past three years. “How I clung onto your empty promises of making me your priority? How I swallowed all the pain and disappointment down and continued rooting for you while you never made enough time and effort to help and support me with my projects or how you have been nothing but a shitty husband to me?!” you finished while breathing heavily, yours words shattering Tony’s heart into tiny pieces.

He looked at you, tears streaming down his face as he didn’t know what to say. He knew that he wasn’t the perfect husband but having to hear that he was bad husband left him shocked. He had never seen you hurt and upset. “I-I…” was all he was able to stutter to which you bit your lip before letting out a loud sigh.

“That’s exactly how I knew you’d react” you mumbled to yourself, now understanding that you were the one who loved the most in your marriage, the one who gave their all into it and was willing to make the most sacrifices.

Without a word, you walked past your husband and made your way out of the mansion to your car, not caring about the paparazzis taking pictures of you at the gate while screaming tons of questions at you. You began to load your suitcases in your car, still not wanting to believe that your marriage had neared its end and that Tony wasn’t willing to fight for it.

He was still frozen at the front door, not wanting to accept that he was the one who had caused you to leave him. When you took the last bag not too far away from him, he snapped out his trance and took a shaky breath as his heart began to pound in his chest.

Suddenly, he was filled with determination and stormed his way to you, finding you in the middle of closing the trunk of your car. “[Y/N]!” he shouted to which you rolled your eyes but didn’t turn to him. Tony let out an angry huff before stopping you from getting into the driver’s seat by gently pulling you away from your car and holding your hands tightly in his.

“Let me go” you demanded, too tired and heartbroken to cause another scene. Your husband shook his head. “No. I won’t let our marriage end, especially not this way” his words made you roll your eyes again, “Wow and suddenly you care about your marriage” you mumbled, the comment hurt him deep but you had made a good point.

“I-I now know that I haven’t been a good husband to you. I had promised to devote myself to you and your dreams and completely tossed those vows aside while losing myself in my work, but please believe me when I say that I love you and am willing to do anything for your forgiveness” Tony spoke while staring deeply into your eyes, the intensity of his gaze making you look away and you instantly felt your heart yearning for him again.

You swallowed hard, “I don’t believe you” you confessed, “Your words don’t mean anything to me anymore. Your actions have made it more than clear that I will never be your priority so just cut this bullshit and let me send you divorce papers” you mumbling, your heart painfully clenching at your last words.

“No” Tony hissed, the mere thought of not having you in his life anymore making him sick to the stomach. He was breathing heavily, normally he was able to get you to stop being mad at him by taking you out or showering you with lots of gifts and flowers. But no amount of gifts and fancy date were able to undo the damage he had caused in your heart.

He didn’t stop gazing deeply into your eyes while slowly kneeling down in front of you, his action made you furrow your eyebrows in confusion. “Get up” you demanded to which your husband shook his head. “No, I need to show you how sorry I am for breaking your heart. For making you feel unloved and neglected. To show you that you are the love of my life and my priority”.

In that moment, you didn’t care that you were being photographed and probably would be making the headlines the following day, this was something Tony had never done before. He wasn’t the one to show his vulnerability or admit his mistakes.

“I am here…on my knees and don’t care what anybody has to say, [Y/N]. I love you so much and don’t want you to leave me. I promise, truly promise that I will fix our marriage and keep you happy for the rest of my life if you find it in your caring heart to give me another chance” his words made you swallow hard as you believed every word he said.

You let out a long sigh and bit your lip, thinking about the pros and cons of giving Tony another chance. He didn’t move, patiently gave you the time to think about his proposition while mouthing “I love you”, making your heart flutter in your chest.

“Okay” was all you mumbled, willing to forgive him and move forwards. Your husband quickly stood up and captured your lips in a passionate kiss that made your head spin and release you from all the pain you had been feeling. He poured all his love for you in that kiss and you let it rush through your body.

“Let’s go inside” Tony whispered after pulling away and quickly glancing at the paparazzis, you nodded your head and quickly rushed back into the mansion with your husband right behind you. “Happy will take care of the suitcases” was all he said before crashing his lips against yours while picking you up, carrying you up the stairs to your shared bedroom.

 

I mean everything that I say
From the bottom of my heart
I will never, never, ever hurt you
I open my hea

rt

Open my heart
Give it to you
Tell the whole world that I’m in love with you
Whatever you want
Baby, I’ll do
I know I don’t want nobody else but you

 

'Cause, baby
There’s nothing I won’t do
To spend my life with you
I’ll give my all to you
I promise that I will never lie to you, boy
There’s nothing I won’t do
To spend my life with you
I’ll give my all to you
I promise that I will never lie to you, boy


Tag list: @jamesbarnesappreciationsociety  l @pleasantdreamqueen l @disneymarina l @koizorahana l l @harleycativy l @itik-angsa l @sparklemichele l @melaninmarvel l @amethyst09 l @the-force-of-imagines l @bossyboyd03 l @enigmaticaphrodite l @pebblesz892 l @stars8melanin l @brittyevans l @toc1985 l @janeyboo l @badassbaker l @earthtocynthia l @lafayettes-baguettes-1 l @winters-beauty l @cannonindeez  l @ilovefanfic86 l @foureyedsiopao l @adorablespecialsnowflakes l @brittanyovens l @kanupps06 l @jazmynejack l @oliviajmarvel l @thebookwormslytherin l @theunsweetenedtruth l @talannalew l @littlexmissxfandomxlover l @amethyst-dreams-and-candy-canes l @dedebebe13 l @challaxkillmonger l @crimsonash330 l @booklover2929 l @aranelgrey l @panda-duuu l @thisismysecrethappyplace l @killmonsgyal l @lokislilcaribbeanprincess l @titty-teetee l @honey-anon l @queenxchallaxkillamonger

-Emma 💋❤️

It only made you huff out in anger “Only shows how devoted I was to our marriage” you whispered before zipping the suitcase up and storming your way out of the bedroom again.

“Mr. Stark is pulling into the driveway” F.R.I.D.A.Y informed you, making your heart drop to the pit of your stomach upon realizing that packing your belongings (while screaming and crying) had taken you longer than expected. “Don’t call me that” you hissed and rushed your way to the front door, hoping that you’d be able to get to your car with your suitcase and leave your husband for good.

“Baby” Tony said while storming into the mansion, so much regret and shame clouding his eyes when he almost tripped over your suitcases before looking at you. His heart dropped to the pit of his stomach, realizing that he had messed up really bad. You huffed and took a step back while wiping your tears away.

 

‘Cause, baby
There’s nothing I won’t do
To spend my life with you
I’ll give my all to you


I promise that I will never lie to you, boy
There’s nothing I won’t do
To spend my life with you
I’ll give my all to you
I promise that I will never lie to you, boy

You and me together
Picture perfect


I’ll spend all my money all my time
Because you’re worth it
It’s just me and you, you, you
What you wanna do, do, do?
Make a move
Call me mama, spoil you like a baby
Thinking about you, dreaming about you
Got me going crazy
What you wanna do, do, do?
Now it’s me and you, you, you
The mood, yeah

 

 

“Don’t call me that” you hissed, your body trembling from the immense pain and anger. Your husband bit his lip, trying to hold in the tears as he took a step forwards and reached his hands out to you, “Please let me explain” he begged, feeling nauseous that he had brought you to this point.

“Explain what?!” you burst out, the salty tears making their way down your cheeks again. “How you forgot our wedding anniversary three times in a row?!” you yelled, not caring how your loud voice echoed through the mansion.

Tony bowed his head in shame and clenched his fits “How you keep neglecting me?! Your fucking wife?!” you continued, in desperate need to tell him how you had been feeling the past three years. “How I clung onto your empty promises of making me your priority? How I swallowed all the pain and disappointment down and continued rooting for you while you never made enough time and effort to help and support me with my projects or how you have been nothing but a shitty husband to me?!” you finished while breathing heavily, yours words shattering Tony’s heart into tiny pieces.

He looked at you, tears streaming down his face as he didn’t know what to say. He knew that he wasn’t the perfect husband but having to hear that he was bad husband left him shocked. He had never seen you hurt and upset. “I-I…” was all he was able to stutter to which you bit your lip before letting out a loud sigh.

“That’s exactly how I knew you’d react” you mumbled to yourself, now understanding that you were the one who loved the most in your marriage, the one who gave their all into it and was willing to make the most sacrifices.

Without a word, you walked past your husband and made your way out of the mansion to your car, not caring about the paparazzis taking pictures of you at the gate while screaming tons of questions at you. You began to load your suitcases in your car, still not wanting to believe that your marriage had neared its end and that Tony wasn’t willing to fight for it.

He was still frozen at the front door, not wanting to accept that he was the one who had caused you to leave him. When you took the last bag not too far away from him, he snapped out his trance and took a shaky breath as his heart began to pound in his chest.

Suddenly, he was filled with determination and stormed his way to you, finding you in the middle of closing the trunk of your car. “[Y/N]!” he shouted to which you rolled your eyes but didn’t turn to him. Tony let out an angry huff before stopping you from getting into the driver’s seat by gently pulling you away from your car and holding your hands tightly in his.

“Let me go” you demanded, too tired and heartbroken to cause another scene. Your husband shook his head. “No. I won’t let our marriage end, especially not this way” his words made you roll your eyes again, “Wow and suddenly you care about your marriage” you mumbled, the comment hurt him deep but you had made a good point.

“I-I now know that I haven’t been a good husband to you. I had promised to devote myself to you and your dreams and completely tossed those vows aside while losing myself in my work, but please believe me when I say that I love you and am willing to do anything for your forgiveness” Tony spoke while staring deeply into your eyes, the intensity of his gaze making you look away and you instantly felt your heart yearning for him again.

You swallowed hard, “I don’t believe you” you confessed, “Your words don’t mean anything to me anymore. Your actions have made it more than clear that I will never be your priority so just cut this bullshit and let me send you divorce papers” you mumbling, your heart painfully clenching at your last words.

“No” Tony hissed, the mere thought of not having you in his life anymore making him sick to the stomach. He was breathing heavily, normally he was able to get you to stop being mad at him by taking you out or showering you with lots of gifts and flowers. But no amount of gifts and fancy date were able to undo the damage he had caused in your heart.

He didn’t stop gazing deeply into your eyes while slowly kneeling down in front of you, his action made you furrow your eyebrows in confusion. “Get up” you demanded to which your husband shook his head. “No, I need to show you how sorry I am for breaking your heart. For making you feel unloved and neglected. To show you that you are the love of my life and my priority”.

In that moment, you didn’t care that you were being photographed and probably would be making the headlines the following day, this was something Tony had never done before. He wasn’t the one to show his vulnerability or admit his mistakes.

“I am here…on my knees and don’t care what anybody has to say, [Y/N]. I love you so much and don’t want you to leave me. I promise, truly promise that I will fix our marriage and keep you happy for the rest of my life if you find it in your caring heart to give me another chance” his words made you swallow hard as you believed every word he said.

You let out a long sigh and bit your lip, thinking about the pros and cons of giving Tony another chance. He didn’t move, patiently gave you the time to think about his proposition while mouthing “I love you”, making your heart flutter in your chest.

“Okay” was all you mumbled, willing to forgive him and move forwards. Your husband quickly stood up and captured your lips in a passionate kiss that made your head spin and release you from all the pain you had been feeling. He poured all his love for you in that kiss and you let it rush through your body.

“Let’s go inside” Tony whispered after pulling away and quickly glancing at the paparazzis, you nodded your head and quickly rushed back into the mansion with your husband right behind you. “Happy will take care of the suitcases” was all he said before crashing his lips against yours while picking you up, carrying you up the stairs to your shared bedroom.

 

I mean everything that I say
From the bottom of my heart
I will never, never, ever hurt you
I open my hea

rt

Open my heart
Give it to you
Tell the whole world that I’m in love with you
Whatever you want
Baby, I’ll do
I know I don’t want nobody else but you

 

'Cause, baby
There’s nothing I won’t do
To spend my life with you
I’ll give my all to you
I promise that I will never lie to you, boy
There’s nothing I won’t do
To spend my life with you
I’ll give my all to you
I promise that I will never lie to you, boy

CHAPTER...
body:
Jet Fighter

(Peter Parker x OC Female)

Description: Jet is a girl with wings and superhuman strength. Need I say more?

CHAPTER 2-

Strike A Deal

Jet’s eyes flickered open for a moment. She took a gasping breath, trying to sit up. She was on a helicopter.

“Stay still.” Sam murmured from somewhere outside of her line of vision. She twisted her head around to see him sitting in a chair, his arms strapped down and his wrists cuffed together. She spotted Scott Lang, Wanda, and Clint sitting next to him, restrained in similar ways.

Jet opened her mouth to say something but Sam shook his head.

“Shhh.” Sam whispered. Jet nodded and she drifted back to sleep.

When she woke back up, someone was carrying her. She tried to move, but her body screamed in pain. She opened her eyes and saw it was an armed guard carrying her. Sam walked in front of her, lead by another guard.

“Sir, she’s awake.” The guard carrying her said as they entered a white room. Her friends were led to separate cells and the doors were locked.

“Get her restrained.” Sergeant Ross ordered. Two other guards walked forward and grabbed hold of Jet’s arms as the other carrying her set her down. With no intent of being gentle, the guards held her still as her wrists were cuffed together and her ankles were chained.

A black strap was wrapped around her shoulders and tightened around her wings. She let out a cry as she felt her bones crack under the restraint. Another strap went around her waist and tightened around the bottom part of her wings.

“Let her go! You’re hurting her!” Sam shouted from his cell, banging a fist against the glass.

“Take her to the lab.” Ross instructed. Jet was dragged from the cell block as she struggled against her restraints.

“Let me go!” She screamed. She locked eyes with Sam just before the doors closed.

“You’ll be okay, Jet!” He called after her. But both of them highly doubted that.

***

“Where’s Jet?” Tony asked, his eyes wandering  around the cell block. There was one empty cell next to Clint and Wanda. Tony turned back to Sam, whose held tilted to the side, his arms crossed.

“Where do you think?” Sam snapped. “Do you really think that they’d leave a scientific marvel like her alone?” Tony’s face paled.

“I told them not to touch her.” He said, feeling like he was trying to reassure himself more than Sam.

“And yet where were you when we were all forced to watch them tie her wings down and drag her to the lab, listening to her screaming the whole way.” Tony didn’t speak so Sam continued, “we told her she would be fine. That even though we were caught, you wouldn’t let a 15 year old girl get locked up. But I guess we misjudged you.”

***

Tony sat alone in a dimly lit room, his arms crossed as he anxiously tapped his foot. The door opened and he looked up. A guard had a tight hold on Jet’s arm, pulling her into the room. She was still bruised and bloodied from the battle even though that was over a week ago. Her wrists were cuffed and a long chain connected them to her ankles, which were also cuffed. Her wings were forcibly folded tightly against her back and held down with two thick black straps.

The guard forced her down into the chair across from Tony. Without a nod to Tony, the guard left, closing the door behind him. Tony sighed and locked eyes with Jet.

“Hey kid.” He whispered.

“Hey.” She answered, breaking their eye contact and looking down.

“What did they do to you?” He asked. Jet, without moving her head, looked over to the camera in the upper corner of the room. Tony smirked.

“I hacked the system. Muted the audio and looped the footage.” Jet looked up at him.

“Then they’ll come back in here.”

“Bolted the door. Now tell me, what have they done?” Tony pressed.

“Why would you care?” Jet spat, “you’re the one who got me locked up in the first place.”

“I told them to keep you safe. This isn’t what I had in mind.” Tony explained. Jet scoffed and sat back, but winced as her wings made contact with the back of the chair.

“I can’t help you if you don’t tell me what they did.” Tony added quieter. He could see the exhaustion in Jet’s eyes, as if she hadn’t slept since she got here. And she was thinner, not by much, since she was already a rail, but Tony could tell.

“It’s more like what they haven’t done.” Jet said. Tony nodded for her to continue. Jet sighed.

“My wings are broken. And they won’t allow me to stretch them out. Any longer with them held down by these straps and they’ll heal wrong. Then I’ll be in pain for the rest of my life. And I’m covered in injuries that they refuse to look at.”

Tony sat forward, knowing there was something more.

“But they have done something. Haven’t they?” He pressed. Jet squirmed under his stare and nodded slightly.

“They do…experiments… try to test my limits. Since I’m a scientific breakthrough and all.”

“Steve sent me a message. To make sure you’re safe. And I intend to do that.”

***

Jet was escorted back to her cell block, where she was unceremoniously pushed to the ground and the door was locked before she could even sit up.

“What’d they do this time?” Sam asked from his cell. His fists were clenched and his face held a permanent glare. The second his doors opened, he swore he would kill every last person who hurt the winged girl. Jet sighed.

“Nothing this time.” She whispered back. “Tony wanted to see me.”

“Stark’s here?” Sam spat. He was the reason Jet was even in this mess. Jet merely nodded.

“What did he want?” Clint asked, leaning against the glass. Jet shrugged slightly, not wanting the camera’s to hear what Tony was actually doing. Clint didn’t press for information, pushing himself off the glass and sitting down on his bed. Sam remained standing, pacing back and forth. 

“How are you feeling?” Wanda asked. Jet looked over to the other girl’s cell block. She looked tired and her hair hung limp against her shoulders. Like Jet, Wanda remained bound. The others were free to roam around their cells, while Wanda was restricted in a straight jacket. Jet would’ve worn a straight jacket too, only it didn’t fit over her wings. 

“I’m okay.” Jet responded. Wanda sent her a pointed look. 

“I know you’re not.” She said. Jet didn’t say anything, pulling herself up onto her bed and laying down on her side. She drifted into an uneasy sleep, her body screaming in pain. 

***

Tony tapped his fingers against the metal table impatiently waiting for Secretary Ross. The gray haired man walked in and Tony stood up. 

“I want you to release Jet.” He demanded. 

“She’s a criminal. Along with everyone else here.” Ross answered, shutting the door.

“She’s a child!”

“That doesn’t change anything.” 

“That still doesn’t constitute experimentation.” Tony said through clenched teeth. 

“We haven’t done any-” Tony slammed his fist against the table.

“Don’t lie to me! Jet told me as much.” Ross held his hands up in surrender.

“Alright, alright. We may have done a few blood tests, but that’t all!” He said.

“I’m willing to strike a deal with you, Ross. So that Jet can go free, and you won’t have to worry about her acting out again.” Tony said, sitting down. 

“What’d you have in mind?”

***

Jet woke up with a start as her cell door was being unlocked. Sitting up, she cowered in the corner of her bed, hoping that maybe this once, they weren’t going to hurt her. The door swung open and Tony stood there. 

“Come on, kid. You’re getting out of here.”

@ginger-elf-queen

“What did they do to you?” He asked. Jet, without moving her head, looked over to the camera in the upper corner of the room. Tony smirked.

“I hacked the system. Muted the audio and looped the footage.” Jet looked up at him.

“Then they’ll come back in here.”

“Bolted the door. Now tell me, what have they done?” Tony pressed.

“Why would you care?” Jet spat, “you’re the one who got me locked up in the first place.”

“I told them to keep you safe. This isn’t what I had in mind.” Tony explained. Jet scoffed and sat back, but winced as her wings made contact with the back of the chair.

“I can’t help you if you don’t tell me what they did.” Tony added quieter. He could see the exhaustion in Jet’s eyes, as if she hadn’t slept since she got here. And she was thinner, not by much, since she was already a rail, but Tony could tell.

“It’s more like what they haven’t done.” Jet said. Tony nodded for her to continue. Jet sighed.

“My wings are broken. And they won’t allow me to stretch them out. Any longer with them held down by these straps and they’ll heal wrong. Then I’ll be in pain for the rest of my life. And I’m covered in injuries that they refuse to look at.”

Tony sat forward, knowing there was something more.

“But they have done something. Haven’t they?” He pressed. Jet squirmed under his stare and nodded slightly.

“They do…experiments… try to test my limits. Since I’m a scientific breakthrough and all.”

“Steve sent me a message. To make sure you’re safe. And I intend to do that.”

***

Jet was escorted back to her cell block, where she was unceremoniously pushed to the ground and the door was locked before she could even sit up.

“What’d they do this time?” Sam asked from his cell. His fists were clenched and his face held a permanent glare. The second his doors opened, he swore he would kill every last person who hurt the winged girl. Jet sighed.

“Nothing this time.” She whispered back. “Tony wanted to see me.”

“Stark’s here?” Sam spat. He was the reason Jet was even in this mess. Jet merely nodded.

“What did he want?” Clint asked, leaning against the glass. Jet shrugged slightly, not wanting the camera’s to hear what Tony was actually doing. Clint didn’t press for information, pushing himself off the glass and sitting down on his bed. Sam remained standing, pacing back and forth. 

“How are you feeling?” Wanda asked. Jet looked over to the other girl’s cell block. She looked tired and her hair hung limp against her shoulders. Like Jet, Wanda remained bound. The others were free to roam around their cells, while Wanda was restricted in a straight jacket. Jet would’ve worn a straight jacket too, only it didn’t fit over her wings. 

“I’m okay.” Jet responded. Wanda sent her a pointed look. 

“I know you’re not.” She said. Jet didn’t say anything, pulling herself up onto her bed and laying down on her side. She drifted into an uneasy sleep, her body screaming in pain. 

***

Tony tapped his fingers against the metal table impatiently waiting for Secretary Ross. The gray haired man walked in and Tony stood up. 

“I want you to release Jet.” He demanded. 

“She’s a criminal. Along with everyone else here.” Ross answered, shutting the door.

“She’s a child!”

“That doesn’t change anything.” 

“That still doesn’t constitute experimentation.” Tony said through clenched teeth. 

“We haven’t done any-” Tony slammed his fist against the table.

“Don’t lie to me! Jet told me as much.” Ross held his hands up in surrender.

“Alright, alright. We may have done a few blood tests, but that’t all!” He said.

“I’m willing to strike a deal with you, Ross. So that Jet can go free, and you won’t have to worry about her acting out again.” Tony said, sitting down. 

“What’d you have in mind?”

***

Jet woke up with a start as her cell door was being unlocked. Sitting up, she cowered in the corner of her bed, hoping that maybe this once, they weren’t going to hurt her. The door swung open and Tony stood there. 

“Come on, kid. You’re getting out of here.”

Bruce and rhodey take apot of godfathers, jan enthusiastically takes god mother while pepper declines- looking after on stark is enough plus she rather be fun aunt. Tony is more than happy with that!

Nat finds out about this godparent stuff and demands to be god mother and is smug as hell when shes given the title. She practically brings it every moment she can and Bruce finds it adorable.

Tony goes between home worlds fir a while but when all his friends are gone he eventually settles on the yautjas planet. With tonys family instead working, they have afterall accumulated way to much money that they dont need any more. Tony routinely donates each month a massive sum of money to several charities and funds young hero’s as tge times go on. summary: For your ai!clint au, can AI's dream? If so, what would Clint dream of on a good day? What would he have nightmares about?
question: For your ai!clint au, can AI's dream? If so, what would Clint dream of on a good day? What would he have nightmares about?
answer:
I HAVE NO CLUE WHEN YOU SENT THIS I AM SO SORRY, ONLY HAVING TUMBLR MOBILE SUCKS DICK

But anyway, I hope I was able to give you what you want, somewhat Read it here at: Now You See Me, Now You See Me Somewhere Else, This is Hilarious I can Scare You At Any Time Period  or under the read more 

“Ow! Clint! Just because you have a robot body now doesn’t mean you get to hit people!” Tony whined as he rubbed at his nose.

Clint blinked open his eyes and groaned. “Mmm sorry, was taking nap. Bad dream”

“…You can dream?”

“Ye”

“…. Of course you can. Why would you not be able to dream?” Tony sighed.

“Ye. Now shuddup. lemme sleep.”

“Oh yes Your Highness, but no more hitting!”

“Mmmkay.”


*******

Clint was laying in a huge field of wild flowers, the wind rustling through them softly, and the sun was shining down in such a way to not make you too hot, just pleasantly warm. 

Phil way leaning on one elbow next to him, his fingers brushing through Clint’s hair. “You know we can’t stay out here forever, right?”

Clint hummed happily, “I know. Real world problems and all that, but 5 more minutes won’t hurt, right?”

Phil chuckled and leaned down to press a kiss to Clint’s nose. “Five more minutes.”

“Yay.”

“Clint I swear to all that is holy, if you don’t wake up, I’m gonna fry your specific circuits.”

Clint groaned, “Dammit, why can’t you stay dream Phil?”

“wHy cAN’t yOu StaY DreaM PhIl…” Phil mocked. “If I have to hear Stark ask for eggos one more time, I’m gonna scream.”

Clint sighed and opened his eyes. “You’re just jealous because you don’t get dreams.”

“Mmm, sure. Come on, slow poke.”

Clint stuck out his tongue, but did what Phil asked. 


*******

“Clint! Clint wake up!”

Clint jolted awake with a gasp. “Who? What? Where?”

Phil looked down at him with a frown. “You must have been having a bad dream. You started turning on all of the kitchen appliances at once, on full speed. Natasha got a strawberry banana smoothie to the face.”

“Oh fuck me…” Clint groaned as he sat up and rubbed his eyes.

Phil shook his head and helped Clint to stand in his robot body. “Yeah, she’s not happy. Care to share what the dream was about?”

“You don’t want to know.”

“I really do… You’ve been getting them more frequently.”

Clint pouted and looked at Phil, but the other AI just stared him down. Clint sighed. “Finnneee…. It’s about-” Clint mumbled. 

“I’m sorry, I didn’t catch that?”

“I said it’s about spmfers” Clint said again, the last word still mumbled. 

“Can’t hear you”

“SPIDERS. THE DREAMS ARE ABOUT SPIDERS.”

Phil blinked, “Spiders? That’s what all your bad dreams have been about?”

“Yes. Little creepy crawly assholes. Getting into my damn main frames and messing shit up.” Clint said with a shudder. “Gives me the heeby jeebies.”

Phil blinked a couple of times, and then nodded slowly. “Right… Understandable…”

summary: Taking fanfic and snippet request!
body:
Taking fanfic and snippet request!

Hey guys, I’m in a very very bad phase in life where all my thoughts are particularly suicidal and I’m not able to write or concentrate on my book. Neither is it financially possible for me go to a psychologist or buy meds atm.

I talked to someone and they said I should.. I should do what bought me to writing in the first place. Hence, I’m begging you all for a headcanon or anything of sort so I can write it for myself and you.

I am currently really into star trek

Here is the link to my ao3 if you wanna see previous works: milestogo56

summary: R-E-S-P-E-C-T
title: R-E-S-P-E-C-T
body:
For you, @feelingsinwinter, based on this prompt by @puppy-bitch24

Yessss, we are going to see Tony, Venom hissed happily, which was lifting Eddie’s mood from being stuck in this line at the airport. We like Tony. He has such nice things.

He was squirming on and under Eddie’s skin like an overexcited octopus, which all in all was not a terribly pleasant sensation but his excitement was contagious. “Wait, whaddya mean ‘he has nice things’?”

Planes. Towers. Cars. Explosives. Each word was accompanied by a mental image, with a final one a picture of Tony in his Iron Man suit blowing up a tank.

“I have nice things,” and he said, feeling a little insulted. He was no Tony Stark, but he made enough money to live nicely in San Francisco and that wasn’t nothing.

Of course you do, Venom said. You have me. Eddie rolled his eyes and stepped into the scatter x-ray machine before the TSA agent noticed he was talking to himself.

Eddie had been a bit worried about the flight, wondering how Venom would do in such a closed environment, but after 30 minutes, Venom got bored, slithered through an access panel, and spent the rest of the flight on the roof of the plane, pleased by the lack of air and unfazed by the wind and the cold. As the plane descended, he slithered back up Eddie’s sleeve, happy as a clam. The sensation of having an alien parasite hum tunes in your own head was.. indescribable.

The driver Tony sent was holding up a sign that said “Eddie Brock and Venom,” which of course was the kind of thoughtful thing that Tony would do and made Venom chuckle gleefully inside Eddie’s head. The real surprise, though, was that Tony himself was waiting in the car; as Eddie climbed in and slid across the seat to give him a kiss, Venom oozed out to slither over him, a short term infestation being its version of a hug.

“Hey, babe. Babes,” Tony corrected when Venom raised its head to scowl at him. “Nice flight?”

“No one got eaten,” Eddie said cheerfully, which was actually a sentence he said often enough that it had actually lost it’s “what the hell is my life” factor.

“Poor Venom,” Tony said when Venom raised his head to sigh melodramatically. “I’ve got sushi at the tower. Nagiri for you, Venom. It’s already dead, my charming little homicidal symbiote, but it is raw.” He smiled when he could feel Venom’s pleasure before it climbed back into Eddie.

Eddie squeezed Tony’s hand gratefully, always surprised at how easily Tony had accepted Venom into his life, treating him like a welcome member of their relationship instead of a bizarre, occasionally terrifying third wheel. Eddie knew that Venom didn’t so much appreciate it as expect it as his due, but Eddie knew how rare it was.

Good mate, Venom agreed, though Eddie had the sneaking suspicion Venom was thinking more of the “planes, towers, cars” from earlier than anything else. 

“We’re going to stop by Avenger’s compound first, I’ve got a little bit of work to do but then I’m yours for the rest of the weekend,” Tony said. “I’m glad you’re here.”

“Rough week?”

“Rough year,” he said with a sigh, so Eddie squeezed his hand again.  


As Eddie followed Tony into the compound, his first clue that something was wrong was when he saw Tony’s shoulders stiffen. 

“Well, hello Tony, kind of you to grace us with your presence,” a voice drawled.  “Long time no see. It’s almost like you get to go out there and have a life while the rest of us are stuck here.”

“Better than the Raft, Clint,” Tony said, voice flat.  Eddie came around to see who Tony was talking to and recognized him from all the news about the Accords and the showdown in Germany. 

“Is it?” Clint said as he came closer, curling his lip at Tony.  “The Raft had better quality food. And company.”

As Tony clenched his jaw against what was clearly an old argument, inside Eddie’s head Venom went ominously still. What did he say?

“Come on, buddy,” Eddie said under his breath. “Don’t pick any fights here, you’re not going to be doing me or Tony any favors by picking fights with his, uh…friends.” Of course, Eddie may as well have been talking to the wall. 

It manifested a head through the neck of Eddie’s shirt so it could cast a baleful eye on the offender. “Friends,” Venom growled, like rocks grinding together, “should show respect.”

“Holy shit!” Clint said, stumbling backwards.  He would have fallen over the coffee table had Venom not formed a talon and hooked the front of his clothes, holding him off the floor by his shirt.

Venom dragged him closer, his shoes squeaking on the tile floor. “Eddie,” it said, black lips pulling back over its sharp, needle-like teeth. “What did you say I could do to mean people? Eat them? While their heart is pumping so fast, so fast, like a little rabbit? I can bite their hands and their feet and their legs and their arms while they fill the air with their screams? Is that what I can do?”

“Well,” Eddie said mildly, pretending to look at his phone while Clint was frozen in terror and Tony was staring at the drama with wide eyes, “first you gotta give them time to apologize.”

“Right,” Venom said, sounding disappointed. He leaned in close, licking a stripe up Clint’s neck. Eddie winced at the phantom taste of Clint’s skin.  “Well? Do you apologize?”

“Yes! I’m sorry!”

“I don’t think that’s good enough.” Venom opened his jaws wide, like a snake, and started to close them over Clint’s head while he made a high-pitched noise like a tea kettle. 

“I accept the apology,” Tony said, having to raise his voice to be heard over Clint’s distress. “You can let him go, Venom.”

Venom stopped with his teeth inches from the bottom of Clint’s jaw. Slowly, reluctantly, he withdrew and set Clint down, who sagged right to the floor, hair damp with Venom’s saliva. “Strike one,” he said, as he crawled back under Eddie’s skin.  “Three strikes, and you’re out.”

“Oh, by the way, Clint, this is my boyfriend Eddie and his symbiote, Venom,” Tony said over his shoulder as he led Eddie deeper into the compound.  “I’m sure you’ll treat them with the same respect you treat me.”

“I don’t think that’s good enough.” Venom opened his jaws wide, like a snake, and started to close them over Clint’s head while he made a high-pitched noise like a tea kettle. 

“I accept the apology,” Tony said, having to raise his voice to be heard over Clint’s distress. “You can let him go, Venom.”

Venom stopped with his teeth inches from the bottom of Clint’s jaw. Slowly, reluctantly, he withdrew and set Clint down, who sagged right to the floor, hair damp with Venom’s saliva. “Strike one,” he said, as he crawled back under Eddie’s skin.  “Three strikes, and you’re out.”

“Oh, by the way, Clint, this is my boyfriend Eddie and his symbiote, Venom,” Tony said over his shoulder as he led Eddie deeper into the compound.  “I’m sure you’ll treat them with the same respect you treat me.”

trail.content_raw:
For you, @feelingsinwinter, based on this prompt by @puppy-bitch24

Yessss, we are going to see Tony, Venom hissed happily, which was lifting Eddie’s mood from being stuck in this line at the airport. We like Tony. He has such nice things.

He was squirming on and under Eddie’s skin like an overexcited octopus, which all in all was not a terribly pleasant sensation but his excitement was contagious. “Wait, whaddya mean ‘he has nice things’?”

Planes. Towers. Cars. Explosives. Each word was accompanied by a mental image, with a final one a picture of Tony in his Iron Man suit blowing up a tank.

“I have nice things,” and he said, feeling a little insulted. He was no Tony Stark, but he made enough money to live nicely in San Francisco and that wasn’t nothing.

Of course you do, Venom said. You have me. Eddie rolled his eyes and stepped into the scatter x-ray machine before the TSA agent noticed he was talking to himself.

[[MORE]]

Eddie had been a bit worried about the flight, wondering how Venom would do in such a closed environment, but after 30 minutes, Venom got bored, slithered through an access panel, and spent the rest of the flight on the roof of the plane, pleased by the lack of air and unfazed by the wind and the cold. As the plane descended, he slithered back up Eddie’s sleeve, happy as a clam. The sensation of having an alien parasite hum tunes in your own head was.. indescribable.

The driver Tony sent was holding up a sign that said “Eddie Brock and Venom,” which of course was the kind of thoughtful thing that Tony would do and made Venom chuckle gleefully inside Eddie’s head. The real surprise, though, was that Tony himself was waiting in the car; as Eddie climbed in and slid across the seat to give him a kiss, Venom oozed out to slither over him, a short term infestation being its version of a hug.

“Hey, babe. Babes,” Tony corrected when Venom raised its head to scowl at him. “Nice flight?”

“No one got eaten,” Eddie said cheerfully, which was actually a sentence he said often enough that it had actually lost it’s “what the hell is my life” factor.

“Poor Venom,” Tony said when Venom raised his head to sigh melodramatically. “I’ve got sushi at the tower. Nagiri for you, Venom. It’s already dead, my charming little homicidal symbiote, but it is raw.” He smiled when he could feel Venom’s pleasure before it climbed back into Eddie.

Eddie squeezed Tony’s hand gratefully, always surprised at how easily Tony had accepted Venom into his life, treating him like a welcome member of their relationship instead of a bizarre, occasionally terrifying third wheel. Eddie knew that Venom didn’t so much appreciate it as expect it as his due, but Eddie knew how rare it was.

Good mate, Venom agreed, though Eddie had the sneaking suspicion Venom was thinking more of the “planes, towers, cars” from earlier than anything else. 

“We’re going to stop by Avenger’s compound first, I’ve got a little bit of work to do but then I’m yours for the rest of the weekend,” Tony said. “I’m glad you’re here.”

“Rough week?”

“Rough year,” he said with a sigh, so Eddie squeezed his hand again.  


As Eddie followed Tony into the compound, his first clue that something was wrong was when he saw Tony’s shoulders stiffen. 

“Well, hello Tony, kind of you to grace us with your presence,” a voice drawled.  “Long time no see. It’s almost like you get to go out there and have a life while the rest of us are stuck here.”

“Better than the Raft, Clint,” Tony said, voice flat.  Eddie came around to see who Tony was talking to and recognized him from all the news about the Accords and the showdown in Germany. 

“Is it?” Clint said as he came closer, curling his lip at Tony.  “The Raft had better quality food. And company.”

As Tony clenched his jaw against what was clearly an old argument, inside Eddie’s head Venom went ominously still. What did he say?

“Come on, buddy,” Eddie said under his breath. “Don’t pick any fights here, you’re not going to be doing me or Tony any favors by picking fights with his, uh…friends.” Of course, Eddie may as well have been talking to the wall. 

It manifested a head through the neck of Eddie’s shirt so it could cast a baleful eye on the offender. “Friends,” Venom growled, like rocks grinding together, “should show respect.”

“Holy shit!” Clint said, stumbling backwards.  He would have fallen over the coffee table had Venom not formed a talon and hooked the front of his clothes, holding him off the floor by his shirt.

Venom dragged him closer, his shoes squeaking on the tile floor. “Eddie,” it said, black lips pulling back over its sharp, needle-like teeth. “What did you say I could do to mean people? Eat them? While their heart is pumping so fast, so fast, like a little rabbit? I can bite their hands and their feet and their legs and their arms while they fill the air with their screams? Is that what I can do?”

“Well,” Eddie said mildly, pretending to look at his phone while Clint was frozen in terror and Tony was staring at the drama with wide eyes, “first you gotta give them time to apologize.”

“Right,” Venom said, sounding disappointed. He leaned in close, licking a stripe up Clint’s neck. Eddie winced at the phantom taste of Clint’s skin.  “Well? Do you apologize?”

“Yes! I’m sorry!”

“I don’t think that’s good enough.” Venom opened his jaws wide, like a snake, and started to close them over Clint’s head while he made a high-pitched noise like a tea kettle. 

“I accept the apology,” Tony said, having to raise his voice to be heard over Clint’s distress. “You can let him go, Venom.”

Venom stopped with his teeth inches from the bottom of Clint’s jaw. Slowly, reluctantly, he withdrew and set Clint down, who sagged right to the floor, hair damp with Venom’s saliva. “Strike one,” he said, as he crawled back under Eddie’s skin.  “Three strikes, and you’re out.”

“Oh, by the way, Clint, this is my boyfriend Eddie and his symbiote, Venom,” Tony said over his shoulder as he led Eddie deeper into the compound.  “I’m sure you’ll treat them with the same respect you treat me.”
